thread.section_title: 4wheelonline.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 4wheelonline.com | www.4wheelonline.com
thread.title: Disgusted

author: Disgusted
title: Disgusted
text: One guy tried to sell me rims he liked. Didnt provide tracking numbr when order was complete. I called to get one and they gave me a run around. They sent the wrong lug nuts, and wouldn't send correct ones unless I bought new ones then sent incorrect ones back and waited for a refund. Difficult to deal with and would not recommend to others. The only positive, my rims came in in 4 days.
